AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: individual disputing the basis for the traffic stop, truck driver who was stopped by Deputy Cox, identified himself and stated he was not used to driving a truck with a trailer attached, has a history of arrests including drug smuggling, denied presence of dope during questioning, served 9 years in federal prison, drove the truck and trailer to a tire shop, gave consent to search the truck and trailer, was placed under arrest
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox: officer who pulled Saldana over, involved in the traffic stop and investigation of Saldana, searched for registration documents in the truck
